obsolete.l2: Want to get a new one?. Click

reservation.unknown: The reservation id @{p1}@ does not exist
reservation.problem: The telescope is not working properly. Please try again in a few minutes
reservation.end: Your reservation has ended, we hope you enjoyed the experiment!
reservation.login: You are not logged in. Redirecting
reservation.nvalid: The reservation id @{p1}@ is not valid
reservation.rating: What is your opinion about the experiment?

tutorial.step1: Step 1: Enlarge the webcam images by moving the pointer over them, to get to see the telescope movement.
tutorial.step3: Step 3: Search objects by their absolute equatorial Coordinates.
tutorial.step4: Step 4: Search objects by their names: M13, NGC5194,...
tutorial.step10: Step 10: Exposure Time selector in seconds
tutorial.step12: Step 12: Click here to take an image
tutorial.step13: Step 13: Click in a snapshot to enlarge it. You can download it in JPG and FITS

focuser.tooltip: Click here to change the focuser position

mount.title: MOUNT
mount.information: You can move the telescope introducing the RADEC coordinates (first and second box) or the target name (third box)

messages.relative_move: Move the telescope a little bit
messages.alarm_set_radec: Problem to set the RADEC coordinates
messages.info_ra: Put here the right ascension coordinate. Format:[0-23]:[0-59]:[0:59]. If you want to know more, click here
messages.info_dec: Put here the declination coordinate. Format: [-90 - 90]:[0 - 59]: [0 - 59].
messages.info_target: In this field, you can choose between object from messier catalog (M1, M2, etc ...), international(NGC500, etc ...) or solar system (JUPITER, SATURN, etc ...)

ccd.title: CCD
ccd.information_exp: This is the panel to control the cdds. To take an image, you have to introduce the time in the first box in seconds (max 120).
ccd.information_filter: In the second box, you can choose one of the available filters in the telescope

messages.time_text: Set the exposure time in seconds
messages.expose_text: Click here to start the exposition
messages.video_text: Click here to select the video mode
messages.main_ccd: Click here to select the main ccd
messages.secondary_ccd: Click here to select the secondary ccd
messages.info_exposition: Select the exposure time in seconds (max. 120 seconds). The exposure time indicates the time the shutter is open.

weather.alarm_text: An alarm has been activated in the telescope. The telescope will not be able to work properly.

general.expiration_time: Your reservation time is close to expire

coordinates_modal.title: Ventana de coordenadas
coordinates_modal.introduction: Especifica las coordenadas del target al que quieres apuntar. Recuerda que las coordenadas deben estar en J2000
